sentences.sContent: He took a credit card out of his wallet.
sentences.sCn: 他从钱包里拿出一张信用卡。

sentences.sContent: ...White’s briefcase and wallet after he left his car here this morning...
...They certainly beat going around with a wallet full of big bills...

trans.tranOther: a small flat case, often made of leather, that you carry in your pocket, for holding paper money, bank cards etc
